tuv.seg: • Detention for administrative purposes
• Coinneáil do chuspóirí riaracháin
• On remand in custody
• Ar athchur i gcoimeád
The criminal law gives the Gardaí certain powers to detain you in their custody after you have been arrested
Tugann an dlí coiriúil cumhachtaí áirithe do Ghardaí tú a choinneáil faoina gcoimeád tar éis gabhála
The purpose of detaining you after your arrest is twofold:
Tá dhá chúis go gcoinneofaí tú ar choinneáil tar éis gabhála:
• To ensure that you appear before a court to answer charges
• Chun cinntiú go dtagann tú os comhair na cúirte le cúisimh a fhreagairt
• To ensure that criminal offences are properly investigated
• Chun cinntiú go ndéantar cionta coiriúla a fhiosrú i gceart
It is important to understand that the powers of detention depend on the offence for which you have been arrested
Tá sé tábhachtach a thuiscint go bhfuil na cumhachtaí coinneála ag brath ar an gcion lenar gabhadh tú
If you are charged and brought before the District Court, you may be either released on bail or detained in custody while waiting for your trial
Má chúisítear tú agus má thógtar os comhair na Cúirte Dúiche tú, is féidir tú a scaoileadh faoi bhannaí nó a choinneáil i gcoimeád nuair atá tú ag feitheamh le do thriail
This is called being on remand
Is ar athchur a ghlaoitear ar na cúrsaí seo
If you are arrested for an offence which does not allow for your detention, then you must be charged with that offence and brought before a judge of the District Court as soon as possible
Má dhéantar tú a ghabháil do chion nach gceadaíonn do choinneáil, caithfear tú a chúiseamh i gcion agus a thabhairt os comhair bhreithimh na Cúirte Dúiche chomh luath agus is féidir
If you are arrested after 5pm on any evening and the District Court is sitting before noon the following day, it is acceptable to bring you before the District Court at the beginning of that sitting
Má dhéantar tú a ghabháil tar éis 5in tráthnóna ar bith agus má tá an Chúirt Dúiche ag suí roimh mheánlae an lá dar gcionn, tá sé inghlactha go dtógfaí os comhair na cúirte tú ag tús an tsuí sin

If, on the other hand, you are arrested for an offence which allows for your detention in a Garda station to assist with a Garda investigation, then you will normally be detained for the period allowed by law

Ach ar an láimh eile, má dhéantar tú a ghabháil do chion a cheadaíonn do ghabháil i stáisiún na nGardaí chun cuidiú le fiosrúchán na nGardaí, déanfar tú a choinneáil go hiondúil don tréimhse atá ceadaithe de réir an dlí
The main pieces of legislation that govern detention after arrest are:
Is iad na príomh-reachtaíochta a rialaíonn coinneáil tar éis gabhála:
• Section 4 of the Criminal Justice Act 1984
• Alt 4 den Acht um Cheartas Coiriúil 1984
• Section 42 of the Criminal Justice Act 1999
• Alt 42 den Acht um Cheartas Coiriúil 1999
• Section 30 of the Offences Against the State Act 1939
• Alt 30 den Acht um Cheartas Coiriúil 1939
• Section 2 of the Criminal Justice (Drug Trafficking) Act 1996
• Alt 2 den Acht um Cheartas Coiriúil (Gáinneáil ar Dhrugaí) 1996
• Section 50 of the Criminal Justice Act 2007
• Alt 50 den Acht um Cheartas Coiriúil 2007
• Sections 16 and 17 of the Criminal Procedure Act 2010
• Ailt 16 agus 17 den Acht um Nós Imeachta Coiriúil 2010
These pieces of legislation recognise the concept of detention after arrest by the Gardaí to assist with their investigations
Tá phíosa reachtaíochta a aithníonn coincheap na coinneála tar éis gabhála ag Gardaí, chun cuidiú lena bhfiosrúcháin
Tthe Gardaí must have reasonable grounds for believing your detention is necessary to properly investigate the offence
Caithfidh cúis réasúnach a bheith ag na Gardaí le creidiúint go bhfuil coinneáil riachtanach, leis an gcion a fhiosrú i gceart
See "Further information" below on the offences to which detention applies
Féach ‘Tuilleadh eolais’ thíos ar chionta lena mbaineann coinneáil
How long can I be detained for?
Cé chomh fada agus is féidir mé a choinneáil?
The maximum period of detention ranges from 24 hours to 7 days depending on which section of the legislation you are being detained under
Réimníonn an uastréimhse do choinneáil idir 24 uair agus 7 lá, ag brath ar alt na reachtaíochta faoina bhfuil tú á gcoinneáil
In most cases, you can be initially detained for up to 6 hours on the authorisation of the member in charge of the Garda station
I dtromlach na gcásanna, is féidir tú a choinneáil suas le 6 huaire ar údarú an duine atá i bhfeighil i stáisiún na nGardaí
For offences under Section 30 of the Offences Against the State Act 1939 your initial detention period can be up to 24 hours
Do chionta faoi Alt 30 den Acht um Chionta in aghaidh an Stáit 1939, is féidir le do thréimhse coinneála tosaigh a bheith suas le 24 uair
To detain you under Section 42 of the Criminal Justce Act 1999 the Gardaí have to first obtain a warrant from the District Court authorising your arrest and initial detention
Chun tú a choinneáil faoi Alt 42 den Acht um Cheartas Coiriúil 1999, caithfidh na Gardaí barántas a fháil ón gCúirt Dúiche i dtosach, a dhéanann do ghabháil agus do choinneáil thosaigh a údarú
You can then be taken from the prison to a Garda station
Is féidir tú a thógáil ansin ón bpríosún chuig stáisiún na nGardaí
Generally, after your initial period of detention ends, up to 2 further detention periods can be authorised by a Garda of the rank of Superintendent or higher
Go ginearálta, nuair a chríochnaíonn tréimhse thosaigh na coinneála, is féidir le Garda ag céim Ceannfoirt nó níos airde, 2 thréimhse choinneála bhreise a údarú
Depending on the section of the law applying to your detention, the authorisation for a further extension may have to be given by a Garda of the rank of Chief Superintendent or higher
Ag brath ar alt an dlí a bhaineann le do choinneáil, b'fhéidir go mbeadh síneadh breise le húdarú ag Garda atá ag céim Ceannfoirt nó níos airde
Further periods of detention may be granted following application to the District or Circuit Court by a Garda of the rank of Chief Superintendent or higher
D'fhéadfaí tréimhsí coinneála breise a dheonú tar éis iarratais chun na Cúirte Dúiche nó Cuarda, ag Garda atá ag céim Ceannfoirt nó níos airde
For Section 30 of the Offences Against the State Act 1939 application can be made to the District Court by the Superintendent
Maidir le hAlt 30 den Acht um Chionta in aghaidh an Stáit 1939, is féidir le Ceannfort iarratas a dhéanamh chun na Cúirte Dúiche
The periods of detention applying under the various sections of legislation are given in the following table:
Tá ná tréimhsí coinneála a bhaineann le hailt éagsúla na reachtaíochta tugtha sa tábla thíos:
Allowable periods of detention
│ Tréimhsí coinneála incheadaithe │

│ │Alt 4 │Alt 42 │Alt 30 │Alt 2 │Alt 50 │
│Initial period │6 hours │6 hours │24 hours │6 hours │6 hours │

│First extension authorised by Superintendent │6 hours │6 hours │24 hours │18 hours │18 hours │
│An chéad shíneadh údaraithe ag Ceannfort │6 huaire │6 huaire │24 uair │18 n-uaire │18 n-uaire │
│Second extension authorised by Chief Superintendent │12 hours │12 hours │ │24 hours │24 hours │
│An dara síneadh údaraithe ag Ard-Cheannfort │12 uair │12 uair │ │24 uair │24 uair │
│First extension authorised by District or Circuit Court │ │ │24 hours │72 hours │72 hours │
│An chéad shíneadh údaraithe ag an gCúirt Dúiche nó Chuarda │ │ │24 uair │72 uair │72 uair │
│Second extension authorised by District or Circuit Court │ │ │ │ 48 hours │48 hours │
│An dara síneadh údaraithe ag an gCúirt Dúiche nó Chuarda │ │ │ │48 uair │48 uair │
│Total │24 hours │24 hours │72 hours │168 hours │168 hours │
│Iomlán │24 uair │24 uair │72 uair │168 uair │168 uair │
│ │ │ │(3 days) │ (7 days) │(7 days) │
Note 1: First extension must be authorised by a Garda Chief Superintendent (or higher rank)
Nóta 1: Caithfidh an chéad shíneadh a bheith údaraithe ag Ard-Cheannfort an Gharda Síochána (nó céim níos airde)
Note 2: The extension is authorised by the District Court following application by a Garda Superintendent
Nóta 2: Tá an síneadh údaraithe ag an gCúirt Dúiche tar éis iarratais ó Cheannfort na nGardaí
If you are arrested under Sections 16 or 17 of the Criminal Procedure Act 2010 the periods of detention applying are the same as those applying to Section 4 detentions (see table above)
Má tá tú ag a ghabháil faoi Alt 16 nó 17 den Acht um Nós Imeachta Coiriúil 2010 na tréimhsí coinneála a chur i bhfeidhm mar sin ag cur isteach ar Alt 4 coinneála (féach tábla thuas) mar an gcéanna
Does the clock stop at any time during my detention?
An stoptar an clog ag am ar bith le linn mo choinneála?

If, during your detention, you are taken from the Garda station to a hospital or other suitable place for medical attention, any period of absence from the Garda station is not taken into account in the calculation of your detention

Má tharlaíonn sé le linn na coinneála, go dtógtar ó stáisiún na nGardaí chuig ospidéal tú nó áit oiriúnach do chóir leighis, ní thógtar an tréimhse neamhláithreachta seo san áireamh nuair atá do choinneáil á ríomh
Other periods may not be counted, depending on the section of legislation you are detained under
B'fhéidir nach ndéanfaí tréimhsí eile a áireamh, ag brath ar alt na reachtaíochta faoina bhfuil tú á gcoinneáil
If you are detained under Section 4 or Section 42 and questioning is suspended for a period of time between midnight and 8am to allow you to rest, the time the questioning is suspended is not counted

Má dhéantar tú a choinneáil faoi Alt 4 nó 42 agus má chuirtear an ceistiúchán ar fionraí do thréimhse ama idir mheánoíche agus 8rn chun ceadú duit do scíth a ligean, ní bheidh an t-am ina cuireadh an ceistiúchán ar fionraí san áireamh
Also, if you are certified by a doctor as unfit for questioning, the time the questioning is suspended is not counted
Chomh maith leis sin, má tá tú deimhnithe ag dochtúir mar mí-oiriúnach le haghaidh ceistiúcháin, nach bhfuil an am a ndéantar an ceistiúchán ar fionraí san áireamh
While you are waiting to consult your solicitor and no questioning is taking place, that time is not counted
Cé go bhfuil tú ag fanacht le dul i gcomhairle do dhlíodóir agus níl aon cheistiú ar siúl, nach bhfuil an t-am sin a chomhaireamh

If you are detained under Sections 4, 42 or 50 and you attend court in connection with an application relating to the lawfulness of your detention, the time you are absent from the Garda station is not counted

Má tá tú coinnithe faoi Ailt 4, 42, nó 50 agus má fhreastalaíonn tú ar an gcúirt maidir le hiarratas a bhaineann le dleathacht do choinneála, ní dhéantar an tréimhse neamhláithreachta ó stáisiún na nGardaí a áireamh

If your period of detention would end while you are at the venue where an application is being made by the Gardaí for a further detention period, it is considered not to end until the final decision of the court on the application

Má chríochnaíonn do thréimhse choinneála le linn iarratais chun na cúirte ó Ghardaí maidir le tréimhse choinneála bhreise, breithnítear nach dtagann sí chun críche go dtí cinneadh deiridh na cúirte faoin iarratas
The Criminal Justice Act 2011 amended detention under Section 4 for certain arrestable offences to allow your detention to be suspended and for you to be released during the suspension
An tAcht um Cheartas Coiriúil 2011 a leasú choinneáil faoi Alt 4 i leith cionta inghabhála áirithe chun ligean do choinneáil chun a chur ar fionraí agus chun tú a a scaoileadh i rith na fionraí
These offences include offences in the areas of banking and finance, company law, money laundering, fraud, corruption, competition, consumer protection and cybercrime
Áirítear ar na cionta cionta i réimsí na baincéireachta agus airgeadais, dlí na gcuideachtaí, sciúradh airgid, calaois, éilliú, leis an iomaíocht, cosaint tomhaltóirí agus cibearchoireacht
Can children be detained?
An féidir leanaí a choinneáil?
Apart from detention under Section 30, the detention of suspects who are under 12 years of age is not allowed
Lasmuigh den choinneáil faoi Alt 30, ní cheadaítear coinneáil na n-amhrastach atá faoi bhun 12 bhliain d'aois
If, however, the member in charge of the Garda station has reasonable grounds for believing that the suspect is not below the age of 12 years, this prohibition does not apply
Mar sin féin, má tharlaíonn sé go bhfuil cúis réasúnta ag an mball ceannasach i stáisiún na nGardaí a chreidiúint nach bhfuil an t-amhrastach faoi bhun 12 bliana d'aois, níl baint ag an gcosc seo
It will be necessary for the member in charge to justify these grounds if it transpires subsequently that the suspect was in fact under 12 years of age
Beidh sé riachtanach don bhall ceannasach na cúiseanna seo a fhírinniú, má thiteann sé amach níos déanaí go raibh an t-amhrastach faoi bhun 12 bhliain d'aois
More information on the treatment of children in Garda custody is available here
Tuilleadh eolais ar dhéileáil le leanaí atá faoi choimeád na nGardaí ar fáil anseo
What happens when my detention ends?
Cad a tharlaíonn nuair a thagann mo choinneáil chun críche?

If the Gardaí no longer have any grounds for believing that your detention is necessary to properly investigate the offence or your detention period has expired, then you must be either charged with the offence or released from custody

Mura bhfuil aon chúiseanna fágtha ag na Gardaí le creidiúint go bhfuil do choinneáil riachtanach chun cion a fhiosrú i gceart nó má tá do thréimhse choinneála imithe as feidhm, caithfear tú a chúiseamh i gcion nó a scaoileadh ó choimeád
If you are being charged with the offence you are brought before the court
Má tá tú á chúiseamh i gcion, déanfar tú a thógáil os comhair na cúirte
If you are detained under Section 42 and your detention is no longer required or it has expired, you are returned to prison without being charged
Má tá tú á choinneáil faoi Alt 42 agus mura bhfuil do choinneáil ag teastáil níos mó nó má tá sí imithe as feidhm, déantar tú a thabhairt ar ais chun an phríosúin gan chúiseamh
Detention for administrative purposes
Coinneáil do chuspóirí riaracháin
There are a number of other instances where you may be detained by Gardaí
Tá roinnt cúinsí eile ina bhféadfá a bheith faoi choinneáil ag Gardaí
These could be described as detention for administrative purposes and don't require the authorisation of anybody other than the arresting Garda
Is féidir cur síos a dhéanamh orthu seo mar choinneáil do chuspóirí riaracháin, agus níl údarú ag teastáil ó dhuine ar bith, ach amháin an Garda gabhála
Examples of this are:
Samplaí díobh seo ná:
• Detention after arrest for drink driving for the purpose of providing a sample of blood, urine or a breath specimen
• Coinneáil tar éis gabhála do thiomáint ar meisce, chun sampla fola, fuail nó anála a thabhairt
• Detention after arrest for the purpose of being charged with an offence
• Coinneáil tar éis gabhála le go gcúiseofaí tú i gcion
• Detention after arrest for the purpose of submitting to a drugs search
• Coinneáil tar éis gabhála chun géilleadh do chuardach drugaí
• Detention under the Mental Treatment Acts
• Coinneáil faoi na hAchtanna Cóireála Meabhairghalair
On remand in custody
Ar athchur i gcoimeád
When you are brought to the District Court for the first time after you are charged, the court has 2 options:
Nuair a thógtar chun na Cúirte Dúiche tú den chéad uair tar éis cúisimh, tá dhá rogha ag an gcúirt:
• It may remand you in custody for a period of no longer than 8 days
• D'fhéadfaidís tú a chur ar athchur i gcoimeád ar feadh tréimhse nach bhfuil níos faide ná 8 lá
This means that you are detained in custody until a particular date when you will be brought back before the court
Ciallaíonn sé seo go gcoinnítear i gcoimeád tú go dtí dáta áirithe nuair a dhéanfar tú a thabhairt ar ais chun na cúirte
This date is called the remand date
Is dáta athchuir a ghlaoitear ar an dáta seo
If you are remanded in custody in Dublin, you will be brought to Cloverhill Prison
Má tá tú ar athchur i gcoimeád i mBairle Átha Cliath, déanfar tú a thabhairt chuig Príosún Chnoc Seimre
• It may remand you on bail for a period that is longer than 8 days if you and the prosecution consent
• Is féidir tú a athchur ar bhannaí do thréimhse nach bhfuil níos faide ná 8 lá, má thoilíonn tú féin agus an t-ionchúiseamh
This means that you are released on bail but you must appear before the Court on a particular date (the remand date)
Ciallaíonn sé seo go scaoiltear ar bhannaí tú, ach caithfidh tú teacht os comhair na cúirte ar dháta áirithe (an dáta athchuir)
When you are brought before the District Court for the second and subsequent times, the court has 2 options:
Nuair a thógtar os comhair na Cúirte Dúiche tú an dara huair agus ina dhiaidh sin, tá dhá rogha ag an gcúirt:
• It may remand you in custody for a period of 15 days or less
• Is féidir tú a athchur i gcoimeád ar feadh tréimhse de 15 lá nó níos lú
• It may remand you in custody for a period of 16 to 30 days, if you and the prosecution consent
• Is féidir tú a athchur i gcoimeád do thréimhse de 16 go dtí 30 lá, má thoilíonn tú féin agus an t-ionchúiseamh
If you are unable to go to court due to illness, the court may remand you in custody in your absence
Mura féidir leat dul chun na cúirte toisc tinneas, is féidir leis an gcúirt tú a athchur i gcoimeád le linn duit a bheith as láthair
If you have been remanded in custody and there is no sitting of the court on the remand date, you will be remanded in custody to the next sitting of a court in the same District Court District
Má bhí tú ar athchur i gcoimeád agus mura bhfuil aon suí cúirte ar an dáta athchuir, beidh tú ar athchur i gcoimeád don chéad suí eile den chúirt i gcuaird chéanna na Cúirte Dúiche
If you have been remanded on bail and there is no sitting of the court on the remand date, you will be remanded to the next sitting of a court in the same District Court Area
Má bhí tú ar athchur faoi bhannaí agus mura bhfuil aon suí cúirte ar an dáta athchuir, beidh tú ar athchur i gcoimeád don chéad suí eile den chúirt i gceantar chéanna na Cúirte Dúiche
If you are remanded in custody for a period of 4 days or less, the court may commit you to the custody of the Gardaí
Má tá tú ar athchur i gcoimeád ar feadh tréimhse de 4 lá nó níos lú, d'fhéadfadh an chúirt tú a chimiú faoi choimeád na nGardaí
This means that you are kept at a Garda station instead of in a prison
Ciallaíonn sé seo go gcoinnítear i stáisiún na nGardaí tú seachas sa phríosún
Offences to which detention applies
Cionta lena mbaineann coinneáil
Section 4 of the Criminal Justice Act 1984
Alt 4 den Acht um Cheartas Coiriúil 1984
A Section 4 detention applies to any offence for which an adult (who hasn't been previously convicted), may be punished by imprisonment for a term of five years or more

Baineann coinneáil faoi Alt 4 le cion ar bith atá déanta ag aosach (nach bhfuil cúisithe cheana féin), agus a bhféadfaí pionós a ghearradh air i bhfoirm príosúnachta, ar feadh tréimhse de chúig bliana nó níos mó
Most offences for which you can be arrested carry a penalty like this, so they come within the scope of Section 4
Baineann pionós mar seo le tromlach na gcionta lena ndéantar daoine a ghabháil, agus tagann siad laistigh de raon Ailt 4 dá réir
Section 42 of the Criminal Justice Act 1999
Alt 42 den Acht um Cheartas Coiriúil 1999
Section 42 of the Criminal Justice Act 1999 allows the Gardaí to arrest a prisoner who is serving a sentence or awaiting trial
Ceadaíonn Alt 42 den Acht um Cheartas Coiriúil 1999 do Ghardaí príosúnach a ghabháil atá ag comhlíonadh pianbhreithe nó ag fanacht le triail
The detention must be in relation to an arrestable offence or offences other than the one for which you are in prison
Caithfidh an choinneáil baint a bheith aici le cion nó cionta inghabhála, lasmuigh den cheann faoina bhfuil tú i bpríosún
(Note: an arrestable offence means an offence for which you could be punished by imprisonment for five years or more)
(Nóta: ciallaíonn cion inghabhála cion lena mbaineann príosúnacht de chúig bliana nó níos mó)
Section 30 of the Offences Against the State Act 1939
Alt 30 den Acht um Chionta in aghaidh an Stáit 1939

While Section 4 of the Criminal Justice Act 1984 and Section 42 of the Criminal Justice Act 1999 cover detention in relation to a wide range of offences, Section 30 of the Offences Against the State Act 1939 only provides for a period of detention in relation to the following offences:

Cé go gclúdaíonn Alt 4 den Acht um Cheartas Coiriúil 1984 agus Alt 42 den Acht um Cheartas Coiriúil 1999, coinneáil maidir le raon leathan cionta, ní dhéanann Alt 30 den Acht um Chionta in aghaidh an Stáit foráil ach amháin do thréimhse choinneála a bhaineann leis na cionta a leanas:
• Offences under the Explosive Substances Act 1883
• Cionta faoin Explosive Substances Act 1883
• Offences under the Firearms Acts
• Cionta faoi Achtanna na nArm Tine
• Offences under the Offences Against the State Act 1939
• Cionta faoin Acht um Chionta in Aghaidh an Stáit 1939
• Offences under Sections 6-9 and Section 12 of the Offences Against the State (Amendment) Act 1998
• Cionta faoi Ailt 6-9 agus Alt 12 den Acht um Chionta in aghaidh an Stáit (Leasú) 1998
Section 2 of the Criminal Justice (Drug Trafficking) Act 1996
Alt 2 den Acht um Cheartas Coiriúil (Gáinneáil ar Dhrugaí) 1996
Section 2 of the Criminal Justice (Drug Trafficking) Act 1996 allows for you to be detained where the Gardaí believe you have committed a drug trafficking offence
Ceadaíonn Alt 2 den Acht um Cheartas Coiriúil (Gáinneáil ar Dhrugaí) 1996 duit a bheith faoi choinneáil ag Gardaí, nuair a chreideann siad go bhfuil cion gáinneála drugaí déanta agat
A drug trafficking offence is:
Is é is cion gáinneála drugaí ann ná:
• An offence under any Regulations made under Section 5 of the Misuse of Drugs Act 1977 which involves the manufacture, importation, exportation, supply, or transportation of a controlled drug
• Cion faoi rialacháin ar bith atá déanta faoi Alt 5 den Acht um Mí-Úsáid Drugaí 1977, a bhaineann le déantúsaíocht, allmhairiú, onnmhairiú, soláthar nó iompar de dhruga rialaithe
• An offence under Section 15 of the 1977 Act of possessing a controlled drug for unlawful sale or supply
• Cion faoi Alt 15 den Acht 1977 maidir le druga rialaithe a shealbhú do sholáthar nó dhíol neamhdhleathach
• An offence under Section 15A of the 1977 Act of possessing a controlled drug in excess of a certain value for unlawful sale or supply
• Cion faoi Alt 15A den Acht 1977 maidir le druga rialaithe a shealbhú os cionn luach áirithe do sholáthar nó dhíol neamhdhleathach
• An offence under Section 15B of the 1977 Act of importing controlled drugs in excess of a certain value
• Cion faoi Alt 15B den Acht 1977 maidir le allmhairiú drugaí rialaithe os cionn luach áirithe
• An offence under Section 20 of the 1977 Act of helping or inducing the commission in another country of an offence punishable under a similar anti-drug-trafficking law in that country
• Cion faoi Alt 20 den Acht 1977 maidir le cion inphionóis a spreagadh nó lámh cúnta a bheith agat ann, faoi dhlí comhchosúil frithgháinneála drugaí sa tír sin
• An offence under the Customs Acts in relation to the importation or exportation of a controlled drug
• Cion faoin Acht Custam maidir le hallmhairiú nó onnmhairiú druga rialaithe
• An offence under Section 31 of the Criminal Justice Act 1994 in relation to the proceeds of drug trafficking
• Cion faoi Alt 31 den Acht um Cheartas Coiriúil 1994 maidir le fáltais na gáinneála drugaí
• An offence under Section 33 or 34 of the 1994 Act (drug trafficking offences involving ships)
• Cion faoi Alt 33 nó 34 den Acht 1994 (cionta gáinneála drugaí a bhaineann le báid)
• An offence of helping or conspiring to commit any of the above offences or inciting another person to do so
• Cion maidir le cuidiú nó comhcheilg chun ceann ar bith de na cionta thuasluaite a dhéanamh nó duine a spreagadh lena leithéidí a dhéanamh
Section 50 of the Criminal Justice Act 2007
Alt 50 den Acht um Cheartas Coiriúil 2007
Section 50 of the Criminal Justice Act 2007 applies to detention in connection with the following offences:
Baineann Alt 50 den Acht um Cheartas Coiriúil 2007 le coinneáil maidir leis na cionta a leanas:
• Murder involving the use of a firearm or explosive
• Dúnmharú a bhaineann le húsáid arm tine nó pléascán
• Murder to which Section 3 of the Criminal Justice Act 1990 applies (includes the murder of a Garda or prison officer)
• Dúnmharú a bhaineann (ina áirítear dúnmharú Garda nó oifigigh phríosúin) le hAlt 3 den Acht um Cheartas Coiriúil 1990
• An offence under Section 15 of the Firearms Act 1925 (replaced by Section 42 of the Criminal Justice Act 2006)
• Cion faoi Alt 15 den Acht na nArm Tine 1925 (atá athsholáthraithe ag Alt 42 den Acht um Cheartas Coiriúil 2006)
• An offence under Section 15 of the Non-Fatal Offences against the Person Act 1997 involving the use of a firearm (false imprisonment)
• Cion faoi Alt 15 den Acht um Chionta Neamh-mharfacha in aghaidh an Duine 1997 a bhaineann le húsáid arm tine (príosúnú neamhdhleathach)
Section 16 and Section 17 of the Criminal Procedure Act 2007
Alt 16 agus Alt 17 den Acht um Nós Imeachta Coiriúil 2007
Section 16 allows for you to be arrested again for certain types of offences in respect of which you have already been acquitted
Ceadaíonn Alt 16 chun tú a bheith gafa arís le haghaidh cineálacha áirithe cionta i leith a bhfuil tú éigiontaíodh cheana
Section 17 applies if you are in prison when you are being arrested again
Tá feidhm ag alt 17 má tá tú i bpríosún nuair a bhíonn tú á gafa arís
The types of offences to which they apply are set out in the Schedule to the Act
Na cineálacha cionta a feidhm siad leagtha amach sa Sceideal a ghabhann leis an Acht
